field.name: description
field.value: My ActiveRecord classes inherit from interfaces with some propertied that need to be implemented in the partial file. I'd like to place this files inside other directories, such as Root\Name1\Class1 Root\Name2\Class2, and the namespaces should match Name1.Class1. In activewriter, i have to create the file in the Root folder, and it generates only in the Root namespace. I could create 2 activewriter files, in Root\Name1 and Root\Name2, but then they cannot have relationships...
